item.description:
Based on the results of our developer topic survey, we're going to be talking about Data Template design.

Agenda:
6:00pm
Food

6:30pm
The Art of Data Template Design

We'll be covering some pretty cool theory on Data Template Design, something that can make or break your installation. Can you find the balance between CMS usability and performance? Have you considered data reuse? What about localization? Does maintaining Layouts induce carpal-tunnel syndrome?

This Wednesday's lecture will discuss the impact Data Templates have on your Sitecore installation, the two most common design mistakes, and a practical solution. Developers should walk away with some pragmatic advice gleaned from a handful of really gnarly installations.

If you're new to data template design, this talk will give you a great roadmap for your next Sitecore installation. Think you're a data template ace? come join the fun! Constructive criticism and alternate views are strongly encouraged!
